fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You appear to not win with Order. Affects up to Uncertain checks. 
- Soulbind: The first time you correctly guess X player’s true roles using Spirit Trap, disable their roles for 2 phases (even if they die). Once the two phases are up, if any of them are alive, one of them will Die. (Their HP is set to 0 minus any damage they took that phase)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Spirit Trap: Guess X alive players’ True roles. Cannot be publicly Revealed roles. If you do not guess correctly within 2 tries, you Die at the end of the phase. You will learn if you are correct at the end of the phase. [2 uses] 
- Abyssal Tunnel: Gain a non-Special card of your choice. [Infinite, 2 CD] 
- Commune: Choose a player, and guess their role. You will learn at the end of the phase if you are correct (Uncertain). [Infinite, 4 CD]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Correctly guess X alive player’s true roles using Spirit Trap before D5, where at least majority of them must be Order. *X = (# of Players/4, rounded)*
